feature.title: Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine
feature.description: Enable Urban Commuters and College Students to request autonomous vehicles through mobile app with sub-60 second dispatch times using GPS tracking, ML route optimization, and real-time fleet management across urban campus zones.
feature.business_value: Reduces average wait time by 40%, increases ride completion rate by 25%, enables 10,000+ daily rides across campus zones with 99.9% dispatch reliability.
edge_cases: GPS signal loss in parking structures

context.product_vision: Transform urban mobility with AI-powered autonomous ride-sharing that delivers sub-60 second dispatch times and 99.9% reliability for campus communities.
